Old systems for managing equipment, schedules, contacts, billing, etc. are cumbersome and often disparate. Surg.io provides end-to-end software developed to streamline the process with each user in mind. Rather than adding to or changing workflows, Surg.io eliminates steps and facilitates communication.Better adoption =  better data. Surg.io allows for reporting across all levels of user to provide everyone with insights to a territory, region, product line, etc. As margins continue to get squeezed, the winners will be the individuals and organizations that that can make smarter distribution and sales decisions.Please reach out to me directly if you are interested in learning how you might benefit.

Successfully identified and executed revenue generating opportunities with current and prospective clients throughout the U.S. within an emerging healthcare technology niche. Created and refined sales processes, marketing materials, and product/service pricing constructs to meet market needs and expedite the sales cycle to exceed sales goals.  • Grew ARR 10X • Negotiated and executed new 17 new contracts resulting in 340% new business growth• Maintained new business close rates above 65% for qualified organizations• Cultivated strong client relationships resulting in 100% client retention and consistent upsell success

Exceeded sales and marketing goals for Stryker trauma implants to orthopaedic surgeons & hospitals. Maintained and built relationships with Doctors and hospital personnel as a reliable resource providing creative solutions to problems, and improving upon inefficiencies.  78% growth and 160% to quota for 2014 in $2.5+ Million territory• Quickly adapted to new territory to average 160% growth and 240% to quota each month•  Finished in the Top 15 out of 200+ reps for T2 Sales Contest for second half of 2014• 13% growth and 105% to quota for 2013 in $1.5+ Million territory

•	Maintained a proven track record of success in cultivating strong client relationships and product sales•	Provided assistance in the development and maintenance of 5 trauma territories within top 5 branch in country•	Managed fast-paced, constantly changing situations requiring on-the-go planning and execution to provide the correct instrumentation, foresight and preparation for unanticipated complications•	Supported orthopedic surgeons by providing intraoperative advice in utilizing instrumentation for improved patient results, while preparing and organizing hospital staff to ensure efficient implantation of devices

•Assisted in managing and developing a growing sports medicine and reconstruction territory generating $70-90K per month •Advanced to territory manager of growing distal extremities division generating $35-55K per month •Responsible for managing and developing distal extremities while continuing to assist in sports medicine and reconstruction •Extensive experience in observing and assisting numerous doctors  through shoulder, knee, and foot/ankle surgeries •Quickly adapted to changing roles/responsibilities in learning new surgeries and products

recommendations: July 19, 2017, Jeff worked with Karin in the same group

I had the pleasure of working closely with Jeff Wertz and am impressed by his talent. He is an amiable, articulate, intelligent individual and customers love him. He is a team player and was integral in helping our team map out solid business protocol for the sales team. Jeff is stellar at building relationships and communicating value and solutions to his customers.  He is one of those rare sales professionals who has it all - he's personable, determined, creative, respectful, data-driven, resourceful and most importantly, a good listener!

Working with Karin was an absolute pleasure. Her first-hand knowledge of the sales process coupled with her exceptional capabilities within SalesForce provides her with the unique perspective appreciated by sales staff and management, alike. As an intangible, Karin's contagious positivity shines through in her approach of viewing every challenge or complication as an opportunity to improve.  This, in addition to her work ethic, makes her an extremely valuable asset that any organization would be lucky to have Karin as part of their team.
